name: Moodtrack music-emotion tools
short_description: Moodtrack contains Python classes for music-emotion analysis and assembly, enabling users to build soundtracks based on emotion and timing. USERS: Music Supervisors/Composers/Producers, Game Audio Developers, Content Providers. FILM DEMO: moodtrack.tv
